portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: そろそろ、武器も買い換えたいんだけど そんな、暇もないよ
portrait_l.ascii: It's about time to replace my weapon, but I'm just too busy.

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: え！キミ、もう武器作れるの？ ヴィーさんのお手伝いかと思ってたよ う〜ん、そうだね〜じゃあ
portrait_l.ascii: Eh! You, can you craft weapons already? I though you were V.E's helper. Hmm, I see, then

portrait_l.ascii: I want this spear, , but

portrait_l.ascii: Thanks. Here, have a Shapestone.

portrait_l.sjis: 楽しみだな〜
portrait_l.ascii: I'm so excited~
